title: Discipline vs. Punishment
itunes:author: Guest: Dr. Leman and Mrs. Daly
itunes:summary:
While disciplining your child is essential sometimes, it must be balanced with a healthy dose of love. John and Danny share how to reassure your kids that you love them, even after you have to correct something they did wrong. Featuring Dr. Kevin Leman and Jean Daly.


Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.


Receive the book "Why Your Kids Misbehave--And What to Do About It" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-05-31?refcd=1483502


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/discipline-vs-punishment/#featured-resource-cta


Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/understanding-the-root-of-your-child-s-misbehavior-digital/?refcd=1443101


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/

While disciplining your child is essential sometimes, it must be balanced with a healthy dose of love. John and Danny share how to reassure your kids that you love them, even after you have to correct something they did wrong. Featuring Dr. Kevin Leman and Jean Daly.
